website_summaries.verdict: Organic daily moisturizer that builds to a natural-looking tan.
pros: High-quality moisturizer with a blend of natural oils
Adds a subtle tint that builds up to a natural-looking tan
Safe for the most sensitive skin and pregnant women
cons: Must use every day in place of other facial moisturizer

website_summaries.verdict: Choose this self-tanning lotion if natural ingredients are important to you and you don't mind not getting a deep, lasting tan.
pros: Safe for most users who have sensitive skin
Earns praise for producing streak-free results without an "orange-y" tint
cons: Results are somewhat subtle, and most users have to apply it every day for the best results

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I have very very very fair skin and I can never find a self tanning product that doesn't make me to dark or orange until I tried this one. I used it once last night and I love the results sooo much! I will be buying this again when I run out!!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Natural looking tan ... and NO Breakouts !
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product with a lovely soft coconut scent. The tan develops nicely overnight as I enjoy putting it on after my evening shower before bed. My only critique is that it doesn’t spread all over for as creamy as it is. ... so I blend it with extra virgin coconut oil, especially over my knees, elbows and feet as well as wrists. This helps diffuse the cream and once the tan develops it looks more natural. Yes.... I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Bimba bella

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Some products leave streaks and are orangey but ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Some products leave streaks and are orangey but this wasn't. Picture on the left is before, top is after 1 application, bottom is after 2 applications. Very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Joselyn

customer_reviews.title: Great tan - horrible smell/ fade
customer_reviews.text: Smells good in the bottle, great during application, and then 4 hours later you will definitely smell like greasy hamburgers. I did two applications one day after the other after exfoliating and moisturizing and while the initial coloring was great as soon as I stopped application the fade has been embarrassing. It's been a week since application and I am so blotchy and streaky I have to wear sleeves and long pants to go to work
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Jekel

customer_reviews.title: Blotchy-greasy, enough said.
customer_reviews.text: All these great reviews are very surprising to me, since I did not find this product great at all. I decided to try this when I went back to order my usually True Naturals in Medium(not a fan of their dark) because of the great reviews and cheaper price, why not? Not only was this formula blotchy but it's very runny and dries very greasy, which as someone with dry skin I normally wouldn't mind. It's a huge bottle, so there's that, but terrible outcome.
customer_reviews.author: SugeS

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this product after reading all the positive reviews; my experience, however, was not positive. This lotion smells pleasant upon application, spreads nicely and is absorbed quickly. I was disappointed to discover several hours later that funky smell on my skin that is all too familiar with self-tanning lotions: The product description specifically stated the absence of that particular “side effect” smell. Overall, this lotion produced a pleasing lightly tanned color (I used it every other day). Warning: Unless you loofah it off, this lotion will stain your towel after showering! I tried to like this product for two months: I have finally thrown it away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it was great. But 2 days later
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this, it was great. But 2 days later, and 2 more treatments turned my skin a dirty, blotchy color that I couldn't get off. I finally hat to fill my soaker tub with baking soda and scrub so hard my skin was sore to get 80% off. I won't be using this again - sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deep tan color, but has a persistent annoying odor/fragrance.  Will not buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: This cream gives an deep tan color, which if one exfoliates the skin before application, lasts several days. However: 1. It's not as lubricating as other tanners, and 2. It has an objectionable persistent odor. Can smell it all day intermittently. The only way to reduce it is to apply a unscented moisturizer subsequently. Note to Manufacturer: please make this UNscented and odorLESS. 3. The product should have less DHDA (dihydroxyacetone) in it because even when use sparingly the tan is too intense. I'd continue using it and re-purchase it only if that earthy smell were eliminated. Hence the one star rating. Clinique Self-tanning is about half the price, has no odor, and produces the proper tan intensity.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Makes me orange!
customer_reviews.text: I really really wanted to like this product. Tried again and again. Maybe I put too much at first so tried another week with less product etc and then I didn’t want to return a half used product so I throw it away. I love this brand. Use their sunscreen and my husband as well everyday, but I Only give 2 stars because of the great list of ingredients and all natural but unfortunately with my skin complexion (pale as f***) it literally makes me orange! Even my husband kept making fun of me. Definitely not for my complexion.
customer_reviews.author: Carine M

customer_reviews.title: Great color, but have to be super careful with application. UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: Great color, but the lotion is white and thick so it's hard to see how well the coverage is being applied. Takes practice to apply as lines show easily if done wrong. Really not sure if I'll buy again. Loreal Sublime is what I'm used to...easier to apply but I didn't care for the smell. UPDATE: I wasn't looking for anything when I wrote this review...just looking to share my experience. To my amazement the company sent me a full refund plus offered another product for free as part of their guarantee. Wow, again, amazed. Certainly a company I'd look to for products going forward due to the way they stand behind their products and their customer service, impressed!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer tessen

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware, not for fair skin. Leaves skin looking orange NOT tan and bronzed.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I received the same product everyone is raving about.. It has a decent smell, but it's a horrible product on my fair skin. It leaves my legs looking orange, its not moisturizing, and it wipes off easily after a shower (even if I waited over 24hrs to shower) which actually was nice considering how orange it left me.. I have applied it with a sunless tanning glove and without and I get streaks or uneven patches every si gle time.. I watched YouTube tutorials on how to apply and still No luck. I do not reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend- Repeat customer!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased several bottles of this self tanner lotion and I’ll purchase again. The color is natural, not orange, buildable over multiple applications and it’s very easy to apply like lotion (I have fair and pink undertones in my skin). Does not transfer to clothing even when wearing light clothing. Preferred over St Tropez or Vita Liberata. Try it! Remember to rub in circular motions and use a damp cloth on knees and wrists and elbows to soften the color after application.
customer_reviews.author: Kbone

customer_reviews.title: Did not work!
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with this at all. It smells good going on but 30 minutes later it smells so bad. I also couldn't tell any difference in my skin color. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: SHANNON BLANKEN

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BE FOOLED BY REVIEWS
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying I have used MANY self tanners! Both high end and cheap. I bought this because of the high reviews but it left my skin patchy and orange streaked with an uneven tan especially on my legs. I know how to apply and to properly exfoliate before and moisturize to extend tan life but was extremely disappointed with this. I personally think the jergens gradual tan lotion does a better job. Very disappointing will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: krissy lestage

customer_reviews.title: Streaky Everytime I Use!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely wanted to love this tanner, it really is one of a kind with its focus on natural and organic ingredients. However, every time I use this I end up with an incredible streaky result. I always prep my skin by exfoliating and shaving. I apply with a mitt and use a very small amount on problem areas (hands, feet, knees, elbows). But no matter what I do my skin ends up splotchy and uneven. Initially I had thought it was something i was doing but after using this product 4 times it clearly isn’t me.
customer_reviews.author: Bazil

customer_reviews.title: Good but orange
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tanner because of the great reviews. I like it ok and will probably continue to use the rest of the bottle but it’s not amazing. I like that it is thick and you can see where you have applied. I did not have streaks. My complaint is the next day I had more of an orange tone versus a brown tone. Totally better than a pale white tone, but still I think I expected amazing results based on reviews. Could’ve just been the way my skin reacted to the product. I do think it’s a good product and maybe an orange tone is kind of inevitable with a self tanner. Anyway, it’s OK. Not amazing.
customer_reviews.author: SarahSue

customer_reviews.title: The SMELL
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this since it’s organic. I put the lotion on before bed and struggled to stay asleep because the smell was so strong . It’s as bad if not worse than any spray tan or self tanner ive ever used. I ended up getting up at midnight to shower and try to wash it off because it was so bad . Will never use again ! The only good thing I can say is that the color is a nice glow, not orange . But not worth it unless you’ve lost your sense of scent .
customer_reviews.author: Laura K.

customer_reviews.title: I looked like a carrot for a week
customer_reviews.text: After applying the product, the color was turning orange. More intensely each hour. I was orange for a week. Not a fun thing to explain. Not a good look on anyone if you ask me. I will keep searching for a product that makes me look less like a pale ghost. It will not be this one, that is for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amna Collins

customer_reviews.title: What’s that SMELL?!
customer_reviews.text: Of all the self tanners I’ve tried, by far, this one smells the worst. Not so much when you’re applying it, but definitely a few days later. I was at an outdoor reception and I kept smelling yeast or maybe stale bread. There was beer and food so I figured that’s what I was smelling. I soon realized that it was me and I was catching a whiff of myself when a breeze blew through the reception area. I looked decent but smelled horrible. It got worse when I began to perspire because the event was in Florida. It also really doesn’t apply as easily as tanceutical products and it irritated the skin on my neck and face.
customer_reviews.author: Secret Shopper

customer_reviews.title: No ‘tan’ just turns you orange.
customer_reviews.text: This is just like all the other self tanners, it turned me an uneven shade of orange. Even applying like they suggested and watching YouTube videos on how to apply it my ankles and knees looks like I’d crawled through cheese dust. It does have a pleasant smell at first but about an hour in it developes a pretty bad smell. Honestly not worth the money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: I looked LIke a Tiger
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to add a touch of color before my nephews wedding and followed not only the directions on the box for this product but also read through all of the reviews and put to practice all the best advice given, however, I still ended up looking blotching and stripped. It was horrible! Luckily with enough showers, scrubbing and using lemon juice on my skin I was able to get the stripes off before the wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time buying self tanner. This is the one I decided to go with and I am not disappointed. It came super fast after I purchased it. The packaging was a little beat up but the self tanner was just fine. What surprised me the most is how much it has and how big the bottle is! Should last me a very long time and I will definitely be using it during the colder time when I can't tan in the sun!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Urcuyo

customer_reviews.title: Orange-ish but effective!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff goes on the skin very white and is very tough to rub in, takes a lot of time to rub this into the skin fully like other lotion. Then after 3 hrs or so, especially the next day, you have intensely dark/orange-ish tinted skin! It is shocking how dark it was but it also stains everything SO bad! My hands barely got any on them, I washed my hands thoroughily and the next day I still had dark orange spots on my hands that would not come off. So, overall, this is effective but also very irritating? haha use a mitt! good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Honest co.

customer_reviews.title: Good for a daily tan, not dark enough for instant
customer_reviews.text: *Update 2: This is now my favorite lotion IF I have a base tan. The color is gorgeous and looks the most real. Will be using exclusively in the summer “tan” months. *Update, the company contacted me and send a nice card and little gift so they are getting one more star. I love good customer service. I get an organic spray tan at least once a month so I purchased this to keep my tan in between sprays. I am a blue-eyed blonde with medium skin and I barely got any color with one application. I would have had to reapply to get a nice color. I would use this as a daily tan instead of an instant tan.
customer_reviews.author: Dirt Diva

customer_reviews.title: Great self tanner
customer_reviews.text: So, now that I've had the chance to use it a few times, here are my thoughts. It's great! I would say 5 stars. I have really sensitive skin and can hardly use anything lotion-wise that won't end up irritating my skin. The color is great/natural, but noticeable. It smells way less than other self tanners (that smell once it develops is there, but much less than other brands). It dries quickly, which is nice; it doesn't have an oily residue either. Also, products that are cruelty free are the only ones I'm willing to use. So, thanks for making such a great product that delivers on color, and is safe for people and animals. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Christine M.

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: This product was more expensive than other self tanner that I've tried, I saw all the good reviews, I assumed it HAD to be good. No such luck. The first, thin application as instructed turned me a dark orange and, worse yet, my skin was blotchy, streaky, and there were odd areas that had little/no "tanning". I look bad. I've tried removing with white vinegar and baking soda, as directed. Next step will be to use fresh lemon juice. I do not recommend this product at all and I'm disposing of it. A big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Not just more natural... actually works better!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this tanner. The ingredients are much more natural than my prior favorite (no more parabens and dyes - yay!). My tan looks more natural and lasts longer too. I love that it contains shea butter. The tip I have for making it look natural is: rub it in all over the body with hands but skipping knees and ankles/feet. Then wash hands well and use a microfiber mitt to buff all over and spread what's there in a thin film over knees and ankles. This keeps it from getting too dark and prevents streaks. Lastly I use the mitt to smooth a little tanner over wrists and backs of hands to avoid a harsh line on wrists.
customer_reviews.author: A. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Decent color, can be streaky or orange if applied wrong
customer_reviews.text: I have used it multiple times and it isn't fool proof, but one layer gives me a natural looking warmth to my skin tone, which is nice during winter months. More than one layer looks disturbingly orange on me (and I have olive skin that tans easily in the sun). Also you have to be very careful when applying so it doesn't streak. For me, it's extra difficult to get an even tone on my face. I correct it with makeup but it can look awkward. Luckily if you mess up it fades within a week. Overall it's a good product once you learn to use it properly if you're a beginner to these products like I am.
customer_reviews.author: bikinibe4n

customer_reviews.title: The BEST non toxic self tanner!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried EVERY self-tanner out there (Fake Bake, Loreal, Nuetrogena, Rossa, St Tropez, etc) and this one is by far the BEST! I've found that most self tanners require multiple layers and just dont get dark enough, but this one was perfect after just a light layer. It blends better than any other product and is the only one that doesnt look strange and clearly fake around the wrists, ankles etc. It it SO natural yet still very dark. I also have been on the hunt for a less toxic, pregnancy friendly tanner and this is honestly the only one out there. I HIGHLY recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: All-natural formula and lovely results
customer_reviews.text: Who knew natural cocoa powder could build such a handsome tan? I’m very fair. So fair that two applications give me a lovely medium complexion. Three applications would create a deep tan, which is too dark for my purposes. Easy to use, smells nice. Color starts to appear after 3 hours. Reaches maximum after 8. I apply it two days in a row and it lasts for 7-10 days. I don’t put it on my face because it might look heavy. I wear a bronzing powder on face, instead. I like the all-natural formula, since most bronzers are highly toxic. I’m a cancer survivor. Avoiding toxins is very important to me. I wear this natural bronzer with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen Arhelger

customer_reviews.title: just another failed self tanner
customer_reviews.text: i decided to chance this product over another due to watering down of my favorite tanner. With all the great reviews on "beauty" self tanner, i thought ok, great, lets try this out! Well, the color was good, and the product works faster than most, but other than those features, meh. The tan left me uneven, and it didnt last long enough, 2 days at the most. It can leave you blotched up. This is basically a product you will try "inbetween times", of searching for some product you can trust. Too much money for this product, and its unjustified. The lesson learned here is, price marketing is just another deception, and not all reviews are honest. Live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: The Killer Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: I like but I don’t like
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to write the review, I like the product but then I don’t like it, like because it stays on good for a few days but I feel more orangish in this product then some of the others I’ve used! It doesn’t go well on around the ankles and I use a tanning brush for that might be my skins pigment that causes it I do moisturize around the areas needed. But products work differently for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Cydney

customer_reviews.title: The results are great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best self tanning product I've experienced. The results last an entire week for me. Using the mit and following instructions, the cream can be evenly distributed for a natural warm color. I found it was important to allow time for the product to dry and absorb for best results. The creaminess of this product may lead to applying too much and having a sticky outcome, so I would caution first time users to be conservative with amounts until accustomed to it. The only time I had any negative reaction to the scent was when I used too much by accident and it took longer to absorb.
customer_reviews.author: EbcS

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I have literally tried every self tanner on the market...and this one is the best!!! Very little smell and to me that is huge!!! It is moisturizing and goes on with a bit of a white tint at first which I love because I can see how I applied it and within no time at all. First use significant color and second application I had a beautiful bronze tan-not orange or uneven but absolutely perfect! I’m so excited!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Slater Art

customer_reviews.title: Easily the best product for healthy-looking skin
customer_reviews.text: For years I had been using a popular product that promised a “glow.” Perhaps the formula changed, because not only was the glow less visible but it would wash right off. I tried this product based on all the great reviews. I had just returned from a fabulous vacation and wanted to make the most of a rare great tan. This. Stuff. Works. Seriously maintains a tan and starts one all over when the real one inevitably fades away. Applies easily and does not streak. Light scent, not that cloying self-tanner odor. Lasts for three to four days before another application is needed. I find the color to be compatible with my skin tone and amps up a healthy look.
customer_reviews.author: Himalayan Consulting

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you'e been waiting for
customer_reviews.text: I've had varying degrees of success and failure with different tanning products over the years, but this one is definitely the one...no more experiments necessary. I never wear gloves or anything like that...just wash palms with a tiny dab of soap after applying. This is a great product, smooth and easy to apply evenly. Subtle tanning so that you can add more the next day for an extra shade of tan. I've used this on my face for over a year with no breakouts or other negative side effects. I love this brand! (See also: dry shampoo and body wash)
customer_reviews.author: Teach08

customer_reviews.title: Lasts only 5 hours
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning of using it, the cream showed great results but the past couple of months are not the same! My skin tone is back to it's original paleness and I use the cream the same amount, and in the same way. I'm not sure if the brand changed the ingredients to the lotion, or what really happened? I'm giving this one more shot and I'm going to put it on twice daily instead of my usual amount. Overall, It seems to only last 5-6 hours after applying now.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Buy this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried EVERY self tanner out there ... and this one takes the prize! I rarely write reviews but I had to for this stuff. Not only is it organic with no harmful chemicals / but it also has a great smell when you apply it (later it does get a faint self tanner smell, but it's mild compared to all the others). Color is awesome - first day was a nice glow and applying again second day was perfect color. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Irish Momma

customer_reviews.title: Even, natural sun-kissed tan
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty skeptical and very hesitant to purchase this. I've tried other similar products in the past and the results have been disappointing. This has not been my experience with this product. This product is amazing and you see the results within hours of application. The color deepens overnight and it's a beautiful, even natural looking tan. You can apply once daily until you reach the darkness desired. I recommend purchasing the application mitt. It helps spread the lotions evenly and keeps the color off the palms of your hands. This product is perfect if you have a special event and want a quick, natural sun-kissed look. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tamlyn

customer_reviews.title: it is truly an even tan and I feel just as beautiful as walking out of a spray booth
customer_reviews.text: I made the switch from toxic products to non toxic, several years ago. The hardest thing to give up was my Aveda shampoo and the one thing I ABSOLUTELY refused to give up was my Ultra Tan membership where I got sprayed once a week. Spraying is very toxic and really affected my hormones, but I did not know an alternative other than being pasty white- until ordered this product. It goes on perfectly leaving no streaks, it is truly an even tan and I feel just as beautiful as walking out of a spray booth- actually, even more beautiful because I do not feel dirty. -Megan
customer_reviews.author: Megan Dresner

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I love this self tanner! A little goes a long ways for me. I think I’m on my third tube in four years. I only use it on my legs because they generally get less sun so the self tanner keeps them caught up with my arms. It hasn’t transferred to my clothes or washed off and I usually apply it once or twice a week, depending on the season. It works great for me and helps moisturize my aging senior citizen legs! Lol
customer_reviews.author: De

customer_reviews.title: BEST SELF TANNER OF ALL TIME!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE BEST SELF TANNER I've EVER USED! And I've tried a ton. As a fitness trainer/yoga instructor - I share a lot of images of my body in fitness clothing, sports bras/shorts to Social Media... even in the winter, so I like to keep a natural looking tan year round. I have been looking desperately for a more natural product that fits my criteria: -Easy to apply -Smells good -Doesn't LOOK FAKE -NO STREAKS -NO ORANGE color -SUPER NATURAL LOOK but with GREAT deep quality color -MUST FADE EVENLY... THIS PRODUCT meets EVERY SINGLE one of those and more. I was absolutely astounded with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Monique -Empower1life

customer_reviews.title: Love this self tanning lotion!
customer_reviews.text: I am in my 50's and my skin is drier than it used to be. Other tanning products dry out my skin more, but this lotion is so hydrating. While the day of use, still has that self tanner smell, it doesn't last like others. By the next day, that smell is gone. I do like the subtle smell of this lotion, not overpowering at all. One of the best things is how long the color lasts. I get a good 5-7 days with it, before it starts to fade. Another huge plus is that there is nothing toxic in the formula either. I am very happy with this product. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: dogluvr24

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I exfoliate the night before with a brown sugar, coconut oil, lemon, and olive oil scrub. Then in the morning brush my skin with their brush mitt and apply using their mitt. It goes on like cream and is white and dries clear. Then a few hours later your skin is tanned. I have tried a couple of products in the past and was very disappointed. This is great and I have had many compliments. I use it weekly during the winter so I am not pale. I am 61 and started dating 6 months ago and this is one of the products I use to make me feel attractive.
customer_reviews.author: NurseDonna

customer_reviews.title: I love this tanner!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this product! The packaging was tasteful and not frivolous. It included a card for info about what to do if I am not fully satisfied. I can already tell that I am and I have only had it on my legs for an hour. I like how easy it was to spread, that it is white so it doesn’t stain towels or sheets. I love the scent which is minimal. I love that I am already noticing the results, in the form of a healthy glow! I love everything about this product and will definitely be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Best product I’ve used in years
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough about this facial sunless tanning lotion. This product delivers results instantly. I am from Britain and am blonde hair / blue eyes with a very fair skin complexion. To my surprise, my first application took away my pasty white complexion and brought a natural color to my face. A second was applied 2 hrs later and the results were phenomenal. I now have a NATURAL looking color to my face. Finally !!!!! A product that goes above and beyond it’s advertised promises I highly recommend this product- you won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth trying out
customer_reviews.text: So quarantine has really made me much paler in complexion and while that’s nice and all I really needed an even tan without sacrificing my skin at the expense of UV rays. I had previously used self tanner before so I knew what I was getting myself into. Basically you’ll want to keep an eye on it to see how long your skin takes to pick up on it and tan. It did not take me a long time to reach my desired result and really only needed it to even out this ugly tan I got by a wearing a v neck on a really sunny day. Overall very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Alizen

customer_reviews.title: this one is really pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: i have to say.., i have tried so so so many tanning products.......this one is really pretty good......i love that it makes you pretty natural tan.., no orange....its a bit runny so put it on and let it dry ,, i put moisturizer on first , let that dry then put this on....!!!!! it really is good.., and no awful smell....i try other products, and keep coming back to this one....give it a try.., i think you will love it...
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Not for me, splotchy results
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this but it is very hard to get an even tan. It does absorb into your skin and dries quickly but you have no idea where all you have applied or how much. I ended up splotchy in spots. The color is nice and as far as the smell it is nice but after developing it still has that self tanner smell just not as strong. So if you are an expert in applying self tanner maybe this is for you. For me the Jergen's Foam self tanner is $20 cheaper and I can see where it goes so I get a more even tan and the color is ok too.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Even, natural glow
customer_reviews.text: This product does has a nice, light scent and does not irritate my sensitive skin. After shower, exfoliating and shaving, I apply an even layer and it dries within 15 minutes. It does leave that self-tanner smell after it processes, but all self tanners do. Take a shower and that smell will go away. The glow it left me with was a natural glow, not an orange streaky mess. Do be careful to apply an THIN, EVEN layer.
customer_reviews.author: Emily F

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST SELF TANNER AROUND
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I noticed one of my friends looked more tan than usual and accused her of using a tanning bed. She then introduced me to this product which has changed my life. This product gives a really nice natural looking color and glow. When I apply it I transform from a sad, pale sick looking person into someone who just spent a lovely day at the beach and got a nice light tan. This spreads really well as long as you rub it in enough. Hands and feet are usually tricky to perfect, but that goes without saying for any self tanner product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Sun kissed skin!
customer_reviews.text: Even though my husband hates the smell of this, this is the best sunless tanner I've tried! I purchased this a month before my vacation expecting to have to apply it for a couple weeks to get the color I need... 2 applications is all I needed! Then I reapplied after about 3-4 days to keep the color. One downfall is if you have items that rub on your skin it will fade off fast. I wear an apple watch and it stains my white band tan (it washes right off). I would definitely purchase again as it has that natural tan look.
customer_reviews.author: Doll

customer_reviews.title: The best self tanner on the market!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great self tanner and I have tried many. I use a mitt to apply and a little goes a long way. There is no odor to this product. And it is not an "instant color" product. But in 24 hours you will have the most beautiful, natural looking tan that you have ever had. I like that it also leaves no color on your clothes or bedding. One application lasts about 5 days. You still have to be careful the spread it evenly or you will get darker spots where it was not evenly applied. You cannot go wrong to use a product that is chemical free and gives you a beautiful, natural tan.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Great natural tan!
customer_reviews.text: I love this self tanner! It’s a gorgeous color. Not orange at all. Make sure you wash your hands well after applying. It does make your hands significantly darker around your nails and the palm of your hand. If you moisturize those areas before applying with your regular moisturizer this won’t happen. Other than that it’s the best! I used FakeBake for years and thought I would give this a try. I am glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Connor

customer_reviews.title: Want to look orange? This is your product!
customer_reviews.text: If you have fair skin and want to look orange then this is your product! First off all, I don’t know what I was thinking buying a lotion that’s white. I should’ve gotten a mousse type of self tanner so that’s my fault. This lotion was very hydrating so I did apply lightly and still looked orange. I can’t wait for this to wear off. I don’t know how people left such good reviews! I’m so disappointed and I look like a hot mess now. My fault for applying it almost everywhere too. This is a just a big fat no from me
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST self tanner I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I've tried lots of different self tanners over the years, but hated the odor and orange tint they all seemed to have. When I got pregnant, I wanted to try something without a ton of chemicals, so I decided to splurge on this and I'm SO happy that I discovered it! It spread on with a bit of a white coating, ensuring that you really rub it in well to eliminate streaks. The color goes on evenly and looks much more natural than most others I've tried, and smells actually pleasant! It's very subtle, so you do need to layer for a few days to get a deeper glow, but it's totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: olgavrealtor

customer_reviews.title: Works but stinks like all self tanners
customer_reviews.text: Smells lightly like coconut suntan lotion when it goes on and can be hard to rub in - a little goes a long ways. Color is decent. BUT, like all of these self tanners, as soon as the lotion starts working on your skin, it stinks. I don't know why it does, but they all do. And the smell lasts for a good 48 hours. Yuck.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, even tan!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely fair-skinned, and I'm always looking for an alternative to cancer-causing tanning beds. I've applied this product twice now and I absolutely love it! I saw results in just a couple hours with a fully developed bronzey tan by the end of the day. I love how the lotion goes on white so you can see where you are applying it. It does smell like most self-tanners as it starts to develop, but not as strong as some. The lotion is super moisturizing and dries nicely. This is an incredibly cost effective alternative to pricey spray-tans and seems to give me a much more even application too! I would highly recommend giving this product a try!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product
customer_reviews.text: I am very pale and didn't feel like this was too dark for my skin. It went on great on my legs but I had a lot of issues applying it to my feet. It went on patchy and wasn't easy to fix after it dried. You could definitely tell that I had on tanning lotion on my feet but it looked great on my legs. I was happy with the smell. It does have that tanning lotion smell after it dries but it wasn't awful. If I could get my feet to look normal I would definitely give this product 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Stewart

customer_reviews.title: BEST SELF TANNER
customer_reviews.text: Best self tanner I’ve ever tried period! 1. Love the fact that it’s white when first applying, makes it less messy. 2. Doesn’t have that strong self tanner smell. There’s a smell as it develops but not as strong of a smell as other self tanners 3. Gives such a beautiful smooth tan that is NOT orange 4. Isn’t botchy when it starts to fade Highly highly recommend. I’ve tried Bondi sands, I’ve tried loving tan and this tanner by far is the best.
customer_reviews.author: nouran

customer_reviews.title: Great golden brown color on my skin !
customer_reviews.text: I love this self tanner, it's the best I have ever tried. I don't give it a 5 because of the smell.....I normally apply it one morning after I take a shower and I can smell it all day, until I take another shower at night. It's not horrible, but it's a weird smell. Besides that, I am so happy with the color I get ! I've used it 4 times since I bought it. More or less one every 20 days, and I keep a healthy nice bronze..... without laying out in the sun. By the way, I am Hispanic with white pale/yellowish skin. I recommend this product !
customer_reviews.author: Cecile

customer_reviews.title: Overall a really good product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this self tanner. My daughter and I both tried it and it has a very natural glow. It spreads easily and doesn’t leave streaks as long as you apply it right. I read some of the other reviews put a light lather on at night before bed and then just rinsed with water in the morning. And it’s perfect. Natural looking and just lovely overall. It does start to smell after a couple hours but nothing as strong as other tanners I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Nicholls

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found this.
customer_reviews.text: One of the better tanners I've used. Gives you a bronze glow instead of an orange glow which is difficult for most self tanners as I have pink Irish skin. The smell is on par with most. It's not a greesy lotion, it applies like sunscreen and needs to be rubbed in and allowed to dry. It doesn't have an instant bronzer to stain clothes, so I like that. It's a good choice for the price. I'll definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: J_B_Cran

customer_reviews.title: BUY A MITT !!!
customer_reviews.text: I repeat, buy a mitt or use a latex glove. a little goes A LONG WAY! it doesn't smell, it is greasy so 8hrs is plenty to leave it on. start from bottom and work your way up your body. I go to the tanning bed afterwards, it helps settle it in. if I don't go tanning afterwards I air dry infront of the fan for a little while until I'm not greasy. overall it is wonderful and it last me at least 3-4 days with being that I go to the gym everyday! I pay dry after I shower so it doesn't scrub off.
customer_reviews.author: Tucker S.

customer_reviews.title: Best I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I have been using self tanner for years. I have used many brands from drugstore to high end ones used in bodybuilding and beauty pageants. This one is the best. It never rubs off on my clothes or sheets. It does not have the usual bad odor self tanners have. It gives a beautiful golden tan color that last. It is organic and devoid of dangerous chemicals. I love it!! I won't be without this.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: This product works really well. I am quite pale and have parts of my body that are incapable of tanning in the sun (chest and abdominals) but this product, after 2 applications, made my entire body a nice smooth caramel color. And you have control over how dark you get based on how often you reapply. As far as price it is a little expensive but it does not take very much to cover your body and so I would guess that one bottle would last an average sized person 3-6 months which makes the cost sound quite worth it considering there really isn’t any other better option for getting tan!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher K.

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a Perfect Tanner!
customer_reviews.text: This tanner works within minutes. If you have allergies to other tanners causing itching, you will love this! I have had no problems with this one whatsoever! It applies beautifully and has almost no scent which I like. I wear it all year long because I am very fair-skinned and it gives me nice color and keeps my skin beautifully soft. It blends smoothly so there is never any line of demarcation where it leaves off. It is the most natural looking tanner I have ever used! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wow gotta love this self tanner!
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this tanner has a great natural tan bronze color. You have to shake it up really well before applying. I always exfoliate my legs first then put a tiny bit of lotion on to smooth out after exfoliating then use the tanner. Use a thin layer and rub it on your skin evenly. It only takes 15 min to dry so it’s no big deal. I wish it lasted longer than 4 days. It’s the best tanner I’ve ever used. Very natural. I’ll buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: FrenchC

customer_reviews.title: Better than most
customer_reviews.text: This lotion does work nicely, it's pretty thick and takes a bit to rub in but the color is nice. Use sparingly around ankles and using a primer lotion prior really helps build color. The scent is decent it's not fabulous but definitely not like the sray on smell from a salon. It does take a bit to dry so plan on standing there around 10 minutes before dressing. I've used alot of other sunless lotions and I would rank this high in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought it was going to be.
customer_reviews.text: So although this product had overall pretty good reviews - not happy with the outcome of the product. There were a couple of things. So not sure if it was me - but every time I applied it was never on evenly. So I’d have these terrible dark patches or streaks everywhere. So one it definitely does work on the darkening, but no matter which way I tried applying the streaking still happened and the other thing was my skin would feel super dry the next day and there after. So if anyone has any tips I still have some left - still willing to try again considering it was an almost $30 bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Looks natural, dries quickly & easily, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have enough good things to say about this self-tanner. It’s not oily or greasy and has no smell. It goes on easily and needs a quick rub into your skin to absorb. I have olive skin and this blends perfectly. Looks natural (NO orange) and is perfect to build color if you want to. Of all self tanning lotions I’ve used in my life, I’ve never come across one so effective & natural looking, and without any mess. Bonus: it dries quickly and does not rub off color on your clothing. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This self tanner is great. If you don’t spread evenly and wash your hands thoroughly after applying then there will be a orange tint but if applied correctly you will have a natural and Beautiful glow. No chemicals makes it even better. Awesome product
customer_reviews.author: mmsolutions

customer_reviews.title: Love this self tanner!
customer_reviews.text: I would give the Beauty by Earth organic self tanner a 5. I am a licensed esthetician and I have had the opportunity to try out many beauty products and several self tanners. I can honestly say that this is now one of my top recommendations! The ingredients are wonderful and the best/safest I’ve seen in any self tanner. The product smells wonderful and doesn’t have the typical ‘fake tan’ smell. I love how this applies slightly white and blends in perfect. It’s so hydrating and moisturizing! I achieved a gorgeous even glow in a few hours!! Thank you so much for this amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but no Fake Bake...
customer_reviews.text: I have been an avid Fake Bake user since my freshman year of college. I LOVE Fake Bake and decided I was open to trying something more natural in ingredients. I give this 4 stars because I am a lot less fan with one application of this! However, I do like the build ability of the product. I usually do one application at night, leave it on the whole next day, shower the next night and apply a second coat then shower again the next evening. I have found using a kabuki brush on ankles, elbows, and knees helps prevent build up in those areas! I love this stuff, but I still think Fake Bake has my heart!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Easy application, Splotchy results
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by a friend of mine. Originally I really liked how it was easy to spread- more like a lotion than a self tanner. It is a very thick consistency and takes a while to rub in all the way. My only complaint is that no matter what I did during application, I just couldn’t get it to go on evenly. It has a nice color tan when it develops, and the smell is pleasant, but ultimately I just wasn’t happy with the end result.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Sunless Tanner!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this sunless tanner! The color is perfect; everyone comments on how tan I am then I let them know its a sunless tanner! They are shocked. It is the only color I have found to leave me brown, not orange and lasts a long time. I feel like it blends easier too. I will say that it is thicker and slightly stickier than other formulas but I feel like it is a better color so I will let that pass. I also don't think there is much of a scent; yes a slight smell as that is what you get with a sunless tanner but it is not offputting. Definitely buy, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: mdkohrs

customer_reviews.title: An organic self-tanner the tactually WORKS!  Woo hoo!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted to get a tan before we went to Costa Rica for vacation because she didn't want to show up all pasty white. She is very light faired skin and I also wanted her to feel tan so that she would avoid sunbathing just to get a tan ... which would actually end up as a painful sunburn. I am hyper concerned about chemicals and their affect on our endocrine system. So, I checked out self-tanners. I order three different brands and this one was by far the best. I also recommend using the kit and doing the exfoliation, moisturizing process first before applying tanner. Happy glowing!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Best Tanner so far!
customer_reviews.text: From the first application I noticed I was darker. It goes on smooth and easy to rub in. Beautiful color, very natural looking! Go very sparing on your hands, my first time it absorbed too much and they were too dark and looked dirty. However, I went light the next time and it great. (Just a note, that my hands are very dry right now too during this COVID19 and using hand sanitizer hundreds of times a day in my line of work probably didn't help this matter any either!)
customer_reviews.author: K Shriver

customer_reviews.title: A purchase you won’t regret.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this tanner! I have tried every tanner on the market, was a frequent spray tanner, but this will forever be my go to. There is ZERO odor. You can put it on, take a few minutes to dry, dress, and it will NOT rub off on your clothes. It does not turn you orange, rather it’s a rich, golden, sun-kissed glow. It goes on white and a little thick, so you do have to work a little harder to spread it around than you would a mousse or liquid. I recommend using the mit just to make things easier. Avoid getting it wet for a few hours. Sunscreen will make it fade more quickly, but that is expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty golden brown, no orange at all.
customer_reviews.text: Have only used this one time but I really like it so far. It went on really smooth. I did follows tips of others and put some argon oil on my feet, ankles, heels, knees and elbows to keep it from getting so dark and dirty looking there. It is white like lotion until it soaks in good. That makes it easier to see putting on. I had several friends to ask if I had been going to tanning bed. One told me she could tell I had been sitting out at ballgames, lol. Of course I had to admit it was sunnless tanner and then they all wanted to know what kind. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S Wiilis

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The scent is strong but better then others I havent tried. It spreads on white which makes ot easy to see where you have applied which I like. It doesnt come off on cloths which is amazing!!! Turned me nice and dark and Looks amazing everywhere except hands, feet, and knees. thats the only downfall, I got to figure out a way to make it look more natural on feet and hands and the smell is a little strong.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Klingler

customer_reviews.title: Looks so natural and Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this goes on. Very easy to spread and looks like a ntaural tan and only takes a couple of hours. Dries fast and doesnt get on your clothes. The smell isn't bad compared to others I have tried. This is the best self tanner and I have tried many. Use about twice a week. Love using it on my face during the winter to have some color. Just make sure you wash your hands after using it, it will stain your hands
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: A little bit of this product goes a looong way. I applied 2 days in a row using latex gloves and it turned out smooth and medium/dark. The only recommendation I have for anyone who’s purchasing is to be sure to follow the directions. People who are experienced with tanners like to skip them, don’t haha
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany V.

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love?!
customer_reviews.text: So far, the best self tanner I've ever used. Incredibly moisturizing. My skin feels SO soft after using it. It has a nice, subtle scent. Nothing overpowering. What I love most is that it does't have a gross after-self tan smell that most self-tanners have. The cream itself is very light, so be careful when you spread it on your body, because it disappears into your skin almost instantly! Can leave streaks if you're not careful, but so does almost every other self tanner. The best part -- it's an all natural brand. Not harsh chemicals. 10/10!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andi Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Better Than a Spray Tan
customer_reviews.text: I had my first spray tan at the local tanning franchise. It lasted about 9 or 10 days, but the time it takes and cost is far greater than using this product. this product goes on evenly and you don't ave to worry about turning your toenails orange like the spray booth does. While all self tanners have some smell before you can shower 8 hours later, this is not that bad, much nicer smell than the spray. You can get a dozen or more applications per tube.
customer_reviews.author: SDF

customer_reviews.title: Best I've used.
customer_reviews.text: My dermatologist recommended using tanning cream for my white skin. Had tried several different brands. Found all worked really well on the palms of my hands. Turned my towel and pillow cases orange brown. But didn't do that good of a job in darkening my skin. This product is white, doesn't stain things, and works like it's supposed to. Seemed a little pricey but the tube is quite large and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Edited: I've ordered this product before and absolutely loved it! My newest bottle wasn't giving me color like before, the seller contacted me and offered to replace my bottle for free plus a bonus product! They suggested I was accidentally sent an older bottle. I really appreciated their wonderful customer service and cross my fingers for my next bottle! This is the most beautiful,natural looking tan I've ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Cortney Rollins

customer_reviews.title: blotchy
customer_reviews.text: Omg! I can’t believe I have to go out like this. This is my second time using it in hopes I just applied it wrong the first time, but nope. It’s def the lotion that is leaving horrible marks on my skin. I made sure to apply it all thoroughly, evenly and follow the instructions but I still ended up with blotchy skin. It does not come off well either after scrubbing and scrubbing, the “tan” is still there. Also, the smell is pretty bad but not as bad as everyone is saying...bottle is big and the actual color is nice it just definitely streaks and blotches
customer_reviews.author: HotCoffee

customer_reviews.title: Best Self Tanning Cream
customer_reviews.text: This is my second summer season using your wonderful self tanning cream. I have used many brands over the years and find this cream is more luxurious. It goes on smoothly and is a very natural tan color. I also find many other brands of tanning cream have a strong chemical sent. This cream has a more subtle scent and I really appreciate that. Using the application mitt allows even coverage with no streaking. I have recommended this product to many of my friends. We all buy it on Amazon.com. Thank you for making a product with organic ingredients. Safe for skin and the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: This is the best self tanner. It actually smells good. Very light scent. Almost smells a little like suntan lotion with coconut oil. It goes on great- no streaks. I have this on subscription so that I can keep getting. I usually only self tan in summer but with this I will do all year long. Finally a great self tanner! And price is not too bad compared to other self tanners that are similar.
customer_reviews.author: G G

customer_reviews.title: Works OK. But just not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Not a big fan of this tanning lotion. It goes on thick even with just a few widely placed small drops. This tanning lotion also comes off on sheets, staining them pretty badly. So it is advised to wear pj's to bed or a long sleeve shirt so it won't stain your sheets. I also found that when it starts to fade it looks pretty bad and patchy. I found that applying a little more to try and even out the color doesn't work so great.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M

customer_reviews.title: Best I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many self tanners before, as I want to have a healthy glow without the skin cancer. This one is the best I've tried. I appreciate that it doesn't smell badly, streak, or stain my clothes. It went on easily after I shaved my legs and didn't take long to absorb. I was happy with the first application. It wasn't incredibly dark on my skin, but it was noticeable. I'm happy that it's not a bunch of toxic chemicals being absorbed into my skin. I would highly recommend this product for a healthy glow.
customer_reviews.author: Texas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this self tanner! The color it gave me was so beautiful and natural looking. It was a deep rich tan. It faded slowly and evenly as well. No discolored towels and no patchy splotches. I have crazy sensitive skin and had no issues with this tanner whatsoever, not even on the fussy skin on my face. I did use a mitt to apply it and had no streaks or uneven patches. The only drawback is that I felt a bit sticky after applying it until I showered, but that's a minor drawback for the payoff. Great product! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING ! EVEN FOR A GUY!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I’m a 37 year old guy that goes tanning a couple times a week so usually I’m pretty tan. Now with the coronavirus situation in the US my tanning store is closed so I decided to purchased this tanner. This thing is amazing! You don’t look orange at all! I might stop going tanning after the lockdown is over because this product is great and not bad for your skin.
customer_reviews.author: gari

customer_reviews.title: Great color- be careful with application
customer_reviews.text: Great self tanner and I’ve tried them all. Color is natural but it is medium-dark and if you don’t throughly wash you hands or use some kind of mitt they will be super stained. Rub in really well and it’s an awesome faux tan!
customer_reviews.author: C.B.

customer_reviews.title: BEST self tanner ever !
customer_reviews.text: I liked the smell, the way this lotion spread, but most of all the COLOR after it 'tanned' my very white body. I can't be in the sun because of melanoma, but I don't like looking unhealthy in the Summer. This lotion is the only one that does the trick of looking natural, smelling nice, and lasting for days. I will buy it every Summer, and use it couple of times a week to look like a healthy person. I don't have pictures, but would highly recommend this lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Johnson MD

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: I have used your self tanning lotion before and just recently bought it again, after getting spray tans for a while. I have found that your lotion is more reasonable financially than getting a spray tan every week and also the results are better. I love the color it gives me and is much easier than running to a tanning salon every week. I also prefer your product over other self tanning lotions because of the ingredients. It is a huge benefit. Overall I give a rating of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: Orange!
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product. First of all, it is white therefore it is difficult to really see where your applying, making it easier to leave streaks. I was extremely streaky. I probably should have used a mitt, but unfortunately did not supply one. If you use a mitt it may come out better. My main issue was I became totally orange! I was careful with my application as to not apply too much since its my first time using it, however I was still orange. Certainly makes a color difference the next day, but if your light/fair like me, do not use!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha B.

customer_reviews.title: PRO TIP! PAY ATTENTION!
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is amazing. I have been tanning for years and found this a couple months ago and am hooked! I see a lot of reviews with streaking and I have never had this problem! THE SECRET is to half it was a plain moisturizer, I use cerave, it also makes the tanner go such a long way! I highly recommend doing this and have never tanned without doing it. Never one streak! Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Sewell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is great stuff. It has a pleasing smell - not like some others I've tried. Works great on your face. You don't have to use a glove to apply. Just make sure to wash your hands and wrists well. I have some white dots where my skin has lost pigment. Those turn brown like freckles with this product. (no fault of the product - just an observation). One application is great for a base. You can put it on 2 or 3 days in a row and get pretty tan. It is best to exfoliate before you apply it. It lasts several days.
customer_reviews.author: twilli

product_meta.title: Self Tanner with Organic & Natural Ingredients, Tanning Lotion, Sunless Tanning Lotion for Darker Bronzer Skin, Self Tanning Lotion - Self Tanners Best Sellers, Fake Tan
feature_bullets: SAY HELLO TO PERFECT SUN KISSED SKIN: Our self tanner transforms your skin. This vegan sunless tanning lotion is cruelty free, never tested on animals and all natural. Transforms even fair skin from "meh" to "marvelous" without any of those nasty streaks, orange color, blotches, or dark spots.

GET YOUR TAN WITHOUT THE SUN DAMAGE OR CHEMICALS: There’s a reason this is one of the best sellers on amazon. This sun free tanning formula gives you a gradual sun kissed glow without sunburns, early aging, and skin cancer. Perfect alternative to brands that sell very chemical filled tanners.

YOUR SKIN WILL THANK YOU: Ever read the back of a conventional tanner? You need a PhD to pronounce all those ingredients. We use only simple, natural ingredients like organic shea butter, organic coconut oil, and nutritive Japanese green tea. your skin will look and feel incredible.

SAFE FOR EVERYONE AND YOU WON’T BE AN ORANGE OOMPA LOOMPA: If you have sensitive skin or are just plain pale, this is for you. Males, females and even teens use our tanning cream and look like they have just returned from travel in St. Tropez or any other eco destination.
GUARANTEE: LOVE IT OR LET US KNOW: We know you're gonna love what our self tanning moisturizer can do. We're so confident that this is the best sunless tanner, that we'll even guarantee it.
